document.full_text: the u.s. roman catholic church and its insurers paid $124 million last year to settle allegations of child sexual abuse, up from $104 million a year earlier, a church-commissioned audit showed on monday.
document.title: abuse claims against priests rise in 2010
lines_and_colors: the u.s. roman catholic church and its insurers paid $124 million last year to settle allegations of child sexual abuse, up from $104 million a year earlier, a church-commissioned audit showed on monday.
